TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Class WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager Implements IDesignerSerializationManager, IServiceProvider
type WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager = class interface IDesignerSerializationManager interface IServiceProvider

summary.span: 管理工作流程在設計階段與 eXtensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 之間進行的序列化。

span.span: Manages design-time serialization to and from extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) for workflows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流程或活動設計工具可以使用 ，存取有助於管理設計階段序列化程序的服務。A workflow or activity designer can use to access services useful to managing design-time serialization processes. 例如， 可以用來建立物件、查詢型別、識別物件，以及自訂特定型別的序列化。For example, can be used to create objects, look up types, identify objects, and customize the serialization of particular types.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddSerializationProvider(class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider provider) cil managed

abstract member AddSerializationProvider : System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider -> unit override this.AddSerializationProvider : System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider -> unit

span.span: The to add.

summary.span: 將指定的序列化提供者加入序列化管理員。

span.span: Adds the specified serialization provider to the serialization manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將自訂序列化提供者加入序列化管理員。 adds a custom serialization provider to the serialization manager. 序列化提供者可以為特定的物件型別或物件型別集提供自訂的序列化程式。Serialization providers can provide custom serializers for a particular type of object or set of types of objects. 進行序列化時，會查詢每個自訂序列化提供者，以傳回特定資料型別的序列化程式 (如果它能夠提供的話)。During serialization, each custom serialization provider is queried to return a serializer for a specific data type, if it can provide one. 序列化管理員會先使用這個方法提供的自訂序列化程式，再使用特定型別的預設序列化程式。The serialization manager uses the custom serializer provided by this method before using the default serializer for a particular type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As ContextStack

summary.span: 取得以堆疊為基礎、使用者定義的儲存區，這個區域對於序列化程式之間的通訊很有用。

span.span: Gets a stack-based, user-defined storage area that is useful for communication between serializers.

value.span: ，包含要序列化之目前物件的相關資訊。

span.span: A that contains information about the current object being serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些序列化程式會要求有關物件內容的資訊，以便正確保存 (Persist) 它們的狀態。Some serializers require information about the context of an object to correctly persist their state. 可讓序列化程式設定物件內容的相關資料，以便將物件序列化為 ，另一個序列化程式可以存取其中的物件內容。 enables a serializer to set data about the context of an object that it is serializing to a where another serializer can access it.

The associated with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 限定名稱是命名空間限定的區域名稱，其格式為 namespace:localname。An XML qualified name is a namespace-qualified local name, in the format of namespace:localname. 因為只有在保存 (Persist) 或讀取 XML 時才需要前置詞，因此它們與 物件無關。Because prefixes are only required when XML is persisted or read, they are irrelevant for objects. 使用者要負責確定區域名稱不包含 ":"。It is the responsibility of the user to ensure the local name does not contain a ":"

span.span: The error to report.

summary.span: 報告序列化中的錯誤。

span.span: Reports an error in serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `errorInformation` 可以為任何物件型別。`errorInformation` can be of any object type. 如果是例外狀況，則會擷取該例外狀況的訊息，並向使用者報告。If it is an exception, the message of the exception is extracted and reported to the user. 如果是任何其他型別，則會呼叫 ，以便向使用者顯示資訊。If it is any other type, is called to display the information to the user.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property Properties As PropertyDescriptorCollection Implements IDesignerSerializationManager.Properties

summary.span: 取得可以透過可用的序列化程式序列化的屬性集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of properties that can be serialized with available serializers.
A that contains the properties to serialize.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以包含空的集合。This property can contain an empty collection. 序列化程式不應假設有任何屬性存在。A serializer should never assume that any properties exist.

MemberSignature.Value: Custom Event ResolveName As ResolveNameEventHandler Implements System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager

summary.span: 於 無法在序列化管理員的名稱表格中找到指定的名稱時發生。

span.span: Occurs when cannot locate the specified name in the serialization manager's name table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件提供方法，讓序列化工具根據要求建立物件，所以序列化工具不必以相依性要求建立物件。This event provides a way for a serializer to create an object on demand, so that the serializer does not have to order object creation by dependency. 這個事件的委派 (Delegate) 會在序列化和還原序列化 (Deserialization) 完成之後立即被清除。The delegate for this event is cleared immediately after serialization or deserialization is complete.

MemberSignature.Value: Custom Event SerializationComplete As EventHandler Implements System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager

summary.span: 於序列化完成時發生。

span.span: Occurs when serialization is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件會在序列化或還原序列化完成時引發。This event is raised when serialization or deserialization is complete. 一般來說，寫入序列化程式碼是為了發出序列化資料，且一般而言並不要求狀態相關的檢查和處理。Generally, serialization code is written to emit serialization data and does not typically require state-related checking and processing. 如果必須在整個序列化中維持狀態資料，則資料可以由可接聽 (Listen) 事件並清除序列化後之資料的序列化工具設定和存取。If it is necessary to maintain state data throughout serialization, data can be set and accessed by a serializer, which can listen to the event, and clear the data after serialization. 因為序列化期間可以重複使用序列化程式，而且留下的狀態資料或開啟的資料流可能不正確，所以序列化後將狀態還原成適當的狀態非常重要。Restoring the proper state after serialization is important because serializers can be reused during serialization, and leftover state data or open streams might not be correct.
